Values.KAFKA_SSL_CA_LOCATION: <Path to .pem file. Required when running on AZ function app. Eg. C:\cacert\cacert.pem> or %SYSTEMDRIVE%\cacert\cacert.pem
Values.VALIDATION_REPORTS_CONNECTION_STRING: Endpoint=sb://<Service bus namespace fqdn>/;SharedAccessKeyName=<Name of shared access key>;SharedAccessKey=<Value of shared key>
Values.REQUEST_QUEUE_CONNECTION_STRING: Endpoint=sb://<Service bus namespace fqdn>/;SharedAccessKeyName=<Name of shared access key>;SharedAccessKey=<Value of shared key>
